Detailed Description

template<typename R, typename P1, typename P2, typename P3, typename P4, typename P5>
class scim::FunctionSlot5< R, P1, P2, P3, P4, P5 >

A slot template for static functions taking five arguments of type P1, P2, P3, P4 and P5, and returning a value of type R.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Construct a new function slot for a static function.

P4  p4,

Calls the function connected to this slot passing it arguments p1, p2, p3, p4 and p5.

Returns:
a value of type R returned by the called function.
